snippet: The Senate is finally about to pass a bill to let states collect sales taxes on purchases made on the Internet.
abstract: Editorial welcomes fact that Senate is expected to pass Marketplace Fairness Act of 2013, bipartisan bill that will authorize states to require out-of-state sellers with more than $1 million in sales to collect sales tax; contends bill is long overdue and closes loophole that gave many online retailers advantage over brick-and-mortar stores.
lead_paragraph: The Senate is finally about to pass a bill to let states collect sales taxes on purchases made on the Internet.
